title: New: Ground Is Lava – Animal
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/groundislavause.jpg "groundislavause")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6909-new-ground-is-lava-animal/attachment/groundislavause/)

With the weather getting more and more marvelous by the day, certain bands and producers suddenly seem to find a resonance. [**Ground Is Lava**](http://www.myspace.com/thegroundislavadude) happens to be one of those producers. His new tune _Animal,_ featuring the vocally competent Weary, is perfect for watching a bank holiday sunset. Oh and check out the sinister video that accompanies the track, if you like go pick it up at [**Friends Of Friends.**](http://www.fofmusic.net/?p=2116)

[Groundislava – Animal ft. Jake Weary](http://vimeo.com/22315195) from [FoF Music](http://vimeo.com/user839241) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
